      • getTransactionId

        public static java.lang.String getTransactionId(spark.Request request,
                                                spark.Response response)
        This method gets the current transaction for a table. If one doesn't exist it creates a new one.
        Parameters:
        request - A HTML request.
        response - A HTML response.
        Returns:
        A transactionId in the form of a string.

      • getTransactionTotal

        public static java.lang.String getTransactionTotal(spark.Request request,
                                                   spark.Response response)
        Returns the total price of a transaction. JSON Input: transactionId: the ID of the transaction you want the total for
